capitalism.utils

Class WebStuff

  • java.lang.Object
    • capitalism.utils.WebStuff

  • public class WebStuff
extends java.lang.Object
    this class delivers web content as string to the WebView components of the app.

      • inputStreamToString

        public static java.lang.String inputStreamToString(java.io.InputStream inputStream)
                                            throws java.io.IOException
        Reads a stream into a String in what is claimed to be the fastest way see https://stackoverflow.com/questions/309424/read-convert-an-inputstream-to-a-string
        Parameters:
        inputStream - the stream to be read
        Returns:
        the result, as a String containing the contents of the stream
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if anything goes wrong
